pullrequest.title: Rotate imu sensor frames to match diagram

content.raw:
Some notes about testing:

In the second test case, make sure to wait until the arm is at equilibrium before looking at the affected value of acceleration.

You can also achieve the same pose using arm teleop: press shift-A until the hand is perpendicular to the starting point, with the thumb pointing towards the ground (so that finger-Y is parallel with gravity).
content.html:
Some notes about testing:

In the second test case, make sure to wait until the arm is at equilibrium before looking at the affected value of acceleration.

You can also achieve the same pose using arm teleop: press shift-A until the hand is perpendicular to the starting point, with the thumb pointing towards the ground (so that finger-Y is parallel with gravity).
